attributes.action: Declare a national Bank Holiday the day after pubs, clubs and restaurants reopen
attributes.additional_details: Breweries, distilleries, pubs, clubs and restaurants are currently taking a serious hit to their revenue streams, which in turn is having a massive knock on effect with jobs and incomes.  The country is also on lockdown and needs a reason to celebrate and look forward to.
attributes.background: For the Government to declare a national Bank Holiday the day after pubs, clubs and restaurants reopen

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304513

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
